title: Authentication System Design Document
body:
## Overview
This document outlines the authentication system architecture and implementation details.

## Authentication Flow
1. User enters email/password or clicks social login
2. System validates input format
3. System checks credentials or processes OAuth
4. On success, generates JWT token
5. Returns token to client

## Security Considerations
- All passwords must be hashed using bcrypt
- HTTPS required for all auth endpoints
- Rate limiting on login attempts
- Session management with refresh tokens

## Integration Points
- Google OAuth API
- Email service for password reset
- User database (PostgreSQL)

## Technical Requirements
- Node.js backend with Express
- JWT for session management
- OAuth2.0 implementation
- Password reset flow with expiring tokens
